tvshow.title: Breaking Bad
tvshow.creator: Vince Gilligan
tvshow.summary: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

tvshow.title: Game Of Thrones
tvshow.creator: David Benioff,D.B. Weiss
tvshow.summary: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

tvshow.title: The Office
tvshow.creator: Greg Daniels,Ricky Gervais,Stephen Merchant
tvshow.summary: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

tvshow.title: Chernobyl
tvshow.creator: Craig Mazin
tvshow.summary: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

tvshow.title: Vikings
tvshow.creator: Michael Hirst
tvshow.summary: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore - and raid - the distant shores across the ocean.

tvshow.title: How I Met Your Mother
tvshow.creator: Carter Bays,Craig Thomas
tvshow.summary: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

tvshow.title: Friends
tvshow.creator: David Crane,Marta Kauffman
tvshow.summary: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

tvshow.title: The Mandalorian
tvshow.creator: Jon Favreau
tvshow.summary: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

tvshow.title: Peaky Blinders
tvshow.creator: Steven Knight
tvshow.summary: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.

tvshow.title: The Crown
tvshow.creator: Peter Morgan
tvshow.summary: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.

tvshow.title: The Man in the High Castle
tvshow.creator: Frank Spotnitz
tvshow.summary: In a dystopian America dominated by Nazi Germany and Imperial Japan, a young woman discovers a mysterious film that may hold the key to toppling the totalitarian regimes.

tvshow.title: Better Call Saul
tvshow.creator: Vince Gilligan,Peter Gould
tvshow.summary: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the time before he established his strip-mall law office in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

tvshow.title: Stranger Things
tvshow.creator: Matt Duffer,Ross Duffer
tvshow.summary: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

tvshow.title: Shameless
tvshow.creator: John Wells,Paul Abbott
tvshow.summary: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

tvshow.title: The Queen's Gambit
tvshow.creator: Scott Frank,Allan Scott
tvshow.summary: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA. But child stardom comes at a price.

tvshow.title: Doctor Who
tvshow.creator: Sydney Newman
tvshow.summary: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

tvshow.title: Lost
tvshow.creator: J.J. Abrams,Jeffrey Lieber,Damon Lindelof
tvshow.summary: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

tvshow.title: Fargo
tvshow.creator: Noah Hawley
tvshow.summary: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. Yet all of these tales mysteriously lead back one way or another to Fargo, North Dakota.

tvshow.title: South Park
tvshow.creator: Trey Parker,Matt Stone,Brian Graden
tvshow.summary: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

tvshow.title: Sons of Anarchy
tvshow.creator: Kurt Sutter
tvshow.summary: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.
